response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product offers unparalleled capabilities and features that can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique benefits, we believe it is worth more than $800,000. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it at an exclusive price of $750,000. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you need any further information about the product. We are confident that you will find immense value in this investment.", "product_price": 750000}
